metadata.title: Stonehenge Large Windproof Travel Umbrella - 54 Inch Double Vented Canopy w/Auto Open and Close Button - Big Enough To Fit In 2 Adults
features: ☂️ A.BROLLY STONEHENGE is the ultimate built to last heavy duty umbrella for the business traveler, golf and sports professional, and daily life. Its ergo dynamic handle, automatic open close and rain repel double canopy umbrella system is perfect for the city or in open fields

☂️ EXCLUSIVE VORTEX TECHNOLOGY allows the canopy to spin around when in contact with objects or people so you can walk around without having to worry about hitting them all the time. It not only keeps you and everything around you safer, it also keeps you dry in the rain by not having to move your umbrella all the time. Plus it let the wind through in gusting conditions and keeps it intact

☂️ ANTI-BLASTER MECHANISM is also designed specifically to allow the umbrella to easily open and close into a compact portable size without sacrificing the size of the canopy or handle. Our extra large 48 inch double canopy and 27 inch long trifold handle bar is the BIGGEST folding umbrella available

☂️ CARRY AROUND WITH EASE: we added a carabiner which allows you to hook your A.Brolly STONEHENGE on your backpack, briefcase or shopping bag to free up your hands as well as space required to carry the umbrella. PLUS an additional multiple-usage, shock-resistant and waterproof travel pouch free of charge for each Stonehenge

☂️ YOU ARE PROTECTED against the elements, rain or shine! We engineer our umbrellas to stand the test of time. With the fiberglass ribs and tips, STONEHENGE is both flexible and durable. LOVE IT OR RETURN IT! We stand behind the durability of our products and offer an unconditional against any defects in craftsmanship
description: is equipped with a number of patented high-tech functionalities. Firstly, we apply our AquaRepel technology on its fabric, making it extra water repellent and you can get rid of the water on the canopy with one fling motion.
Have you ever experienced walking along a crowded walkway with an umbrella? It causes you to twist and turn your umbrella constantly. Our
allows the canopy to spin around with opposing forces so you can simply walk through without having to reposition your umbrella all the time.
into the shaft of the umbrella makes the umbrella easier to close than ever. No more struggling to close the umbrella.
The addition of the self-locking shaft ensures that the umbrella would not shoot open as the self-locking shaft gently controls the closing of the umbrella for the user.
Size of 54 in when opened, enough to fully cover 2 people shoulder by shoulder. It protects your family from getting wet under heavy rain.

Approximately 18 million pieces of umbrellas are sent to landfill each year. We aim to be part of the Solution and not the problem hence why the Stonehenge umbrella in addition to its environmental credentials is made from the very best umbrella frames so it will stand the test of time and be around for many years to come.
With decades of experiences in making umbrellas, A.Brolly is highly advanced in umbrella making technologies and is one of the very few manufacturers that own multiple umbrella patents worldwide.

The Vortex and Anti-Blaster technologies used in the A.Brolly Stonehenge are self-developed and self-owned patents, and it ensures that A.Brolly Stonehenge has unique and exclusive features that are absolutely different from most umbrellas in the market.
